thought: To craft cyan_carpet, I need to first craft white_carpet. To craft white_carpet, I need to place 2 white_wool next to each other in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the white_wool from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
